DOC.brief_summary: This multi-centre , randomised , double-blind , active-controlled , parallel-group comparative trial compare fix dose combination ( FDC ) telmisartan 80 mg +hydrochlorothiazide 12.5 mg amlodipine 5 mg ( T80/A5/H12.5 mg ) telmisartan 80 mg+ amlodipine 5 mg ( T80/A5 mg ) blood pressure lower effect week 8 , end double-blind period essential hypertensive patient fail respond adequately telmisartan 80 mg+ amlodipine 5 mg . Patients assign one two group 6-week open-label run-in period take T80/A5 mg .
